title: Essay on Criticism - believes "verbal critic" is

content.prompt: The speaker believes that the “verbal critic” (line 47) is

choices.label: essentially objective in his or her evaluations
a good guide for poets to follow
too idealistic to understand most real poetry

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
